document.full_text: a prosecutor took a combative tone with a key defense witness at raj rajaratnam's insider trading trial on wednesday, trying to poke holes in arguments that the galleon group founder's trades were based on research and published reports.
document.title: rajaratnam trial prosecutor raises temperature
lines_and_colors: a prosecutor took a combative tone with a key defense witness at raj rajaratnam's insider trading trial on wednesday, trying to poke holes in arguments that the galleon group founder's trades were based on research and published reports.
